text: Approval for a new model PTCA catheter.  The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name Takumi(TM) Over the Wire Percutaneous Transluminal Coronary Angioplasty (PTCA) Catheter and is indicated for balloon dilatation of the stenotic portion of a coronary artery or bypass graft stenosis for the purpose of improving myocardial perfusion.
